# lazy.work
Some R functions to save your time at Work

## Install

```r
devtools::install_github("frankzhangsyd/lazy.work")
```

## Main Usages

### Alteryx Related

**ayx_fl**:convert a vector of column names and a function symbol`("+","-","*","/")` across all.

ie: 

```{r}
ayx_fl(c("a","b"))

```
